sentences.english: It sounds like the crying of a baby.
sentences.chinese: 听起来像小孩的哭泣声。

sentences.english: Stop weeping for such an unthankful man like him!
sentences.chinese: 何必为他没良心的人哭泣呢？

sentences.english: And rarely should a man cry in pain.
sentences.chinese: 而且男人很少该在痛苦中哭泣。

sentences.english: His face scrunches up. He begins to cry.
sentences.chinese: 哈雷一言未发，他的面部扭曲着，开始哭泣。

sentences.english: Romance is seeing flowers withering away you want to cry.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫是瞧见花将凋零想哭泣。

sentences.english: Weep no more , no sigh , nor groan . Sorrow calls no time that's gone .
sentences.chinese: 栵别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟，悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

sentences.english: I was not always simple, memorable love cry.
sentences.chinese: 单纯的莪，总是为罘值得留恋的爱情而哭泣。

sentences.english: If you feel sad you can cry on my shoulder…
sentences.chinese: 闷闷闷，下载那首在我的肩膀哭泣都下不到。

sentences.english: Ham was standing by the door, while Emily was sobbing in Daniel's arms.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆站在门边，埃米莉倒在丹尼尔的臂弯里哭泣。

sentences.english: She's sobbing because her boyfriend broke up with her.
sentences.chinese: 她正抽抽噎噎地哭泣，因为男友和她分手了。

sentences.english: Don't cry because it cames to an end, smile because it happened.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为他的结束而哭泣，应当为它的发生而微笑。

sentences.english: I could cry but I couldnot erase the crying imprints.
sentences.chinese: 我可以哭但是却擦不掉哭泣的痕迹。

sentences.english: July 11I have heard the crying of your heart.
Bury your talents, and you get “weeping and gnashing ofteeth.”
sentences.chinese: 埋藏自己的才能，你将“哭泣并咬牙切齿”。

sentences.english: Because you and I will not cry.
The water was actually a tear form a young riel who was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这滴水实际上是一个正在哭泣的年轻姑娘的泪水。

definition: to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
